page.title: 18RECREATION
page.content: As far as recreational facilities for children go, the area is very well served.There are many small play areas some with swings and slides, some with grassy areas but others with football pitches while the new Fordton Leisure centre offers a wide variety of recreational facilities for old and young alike.Here there are swimming pools, saunas, facilities for squash, table tennis and other indoor games, and popmobility, which is very popular.At Fordton, sports courses and coaching sessions for children are organised during school holidays. Courses are also organised at the Studio at Padgate.The studio was opened in 1982 as part of the dual_use Padgate District Centre(facilities are shared with school).These include Drama Studio, sports hall , hard porous pitch with floodlighting etc.
